mean_cn: n.魔术，戏法；  adj.有魔力的，魔术的
mean_en: the art of doing tricks that seem impossible in order to entertain people; the secret power of appearing to make impossible things happen by saying special words or doing special things; the art of doing tricks that seem impossible in order to entertain people
sentence: Pulling a rabbit out of a hat is the most classic magic trick.
sentence_trans: 从帽子里拉出一只兔子是最经典的魔术戏法。
word_etyma: mag=mage魔术师 + ic…术 → magic魔术
